meanings.sent1: The lion is the dominant animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She is the dominant player on the team.
meanings.sent3: The dominant queen bee ruled over the hive with grace.
meanings.sent4: His dominant presence filled the room like a towering mountain.
meanings.sent5: The dominant sun cast a warm glow over the entire valley.

meanings.definition: Exercising control or influence over others.
meanings.sent1: The dominant boss made all the decisions in the office.
meanings.sent2: Her dominant personality always led the group.
meanings.sent3: The dominant cat ruled the neighborhood with a velvet paw.
meanings.sent4: His dominant gaze held everyone's attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dominant leader guided the team to victory with ease.

meanings.definition: In genetics, referring to a trait that will be expressed in an individual even if only one copy of the gene is present.
meanings.sent1: The dominant gene determined the color of the flower.
meanings.sent2: Her dominant allele resulted in the blue eye color.
meanings.sent3: The dominant genetic trait made him stand out in the family.
meanings.sent4: The dominant genetic marker shone brightly in the DNA sequence.
meanings.sent5: The dominant genetic characteristic was passed down through generations.
